LanguageData.MessageVoidSpawnTransform: {0} has turned into a void spawn.
LanguageData.CommandVoidSpawnGroupingDesc: (Right click to switch group)\n\nAs a gestalt controlled race, thought synchronization is a must for all void spawns.
LanguageData.VoidSpawnSettingUseDarkenBackground: Should use In the Dark's background planet
LanguageData.VoidSpawnSettingUseDarkenBackgroundToolt:
Needs restart

Changes the background planet to our own planet. This option may conflict with other mods which change background.
